tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.critica: Critical hits do 3x damage, +10% crit chance
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.final_s: When this mob's health is below 25%, it does double damage
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.committ: Do more damage to wounded mobs
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.pain_cy: Every fourth attack does 4x damage, drains 3% health per round
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.void_st: Attacks to the same mob get progressively stronger
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.leechin: Killed mobs heal this mob for 5% of their max health
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.guardin: Take 50% damage for 3 rounds after killing a mob
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.rampagi: Gain +50% attack speed for 3 rounds after killing a mob
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.stunnin: 10% chance to stun the enemy for 2 turns instead of attacking
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.weakeni: 10% chance to weaken the enemy for 2 turns instead of attacking
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.poison_: 10% chance to poison the enemy for 2 turns instead of attacking
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.radianc: 10% chance to heal 10% health instead of attacking
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.deflect: 10% chance to deflect 25% damage and deal it back to the enemy
Deal 50% of damage taken back to the attacker
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.enigma_: Gain additional critical hit chance per soul in this mob
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.anima_c: 5% to heal health equal to 20% of soul
tooltip.mob_enchantment.mobitems.soul_si: Always get souls on enemy kill
jei.mobitems.converter.description: Created by using Worm Food on an empty ITEMizer™
jei.mobitems.spawn_capturer.description: Created by using a Nether Star on an full ITEMizer™
jei.mobitems.mob_soul.description: Created by either extracting it from a mob block placed on the ITEM™ Soul Extractor, or by washing a dusty mob soul
jei.mobitems.dusty_mob_soul.description: Created by vacuuming up a mob with 2 and a half hearts or less
